about_the_game:
FEATURES

  • A unique relationship between player and player character.

  • A rich and well thought out world and story.

  • Unique characters and many optional NPC’s.

  • Dynamic cutscenes.

  • Intuitive turn based combat.

  • 3 characters with unique roles in and outside of combat.

  • A unique system of character progression.

  • Diverse playstyle options.

  • 2 unique boss fights (for now).

  • Elevators (I’m proud of them).

  • Various Puzzles.

  • Lots of laughs.

  • The seeds of a mystery.

  • At least one spine chilling moment.

STORY PREMISE

Nearly a century ago, CORRUPTION EVENTS stripped countless individuals of their identities, losing who they were, and being replaced with blank slates known as the "GLITCHLESS".
Without a face, without a name.  Now, 100 years later, surely such a thing couldn't happen again, right?

GUIDE Verity and her companions on their quest to SEAL the GATEWAYS to the UNSEEN PLANE, and "restore the balance of the world".

That's the right thing to do, right?

The path isn't straight forward, but then again it never is.  In the twists and turns of destiny, the choices you and Verity make will shape the end of this road.

The choices of others too, some you've yet to meet.

Whatever the case, you best be sure to FOLLOW YOUR HEART.  And let Verity follow hers.

GAMEPLAY

GUIDANCE uses a unique system for character progression!

  • Collect SOUL SHARDS of different varieties by defeating enemies! FORGE these SHARDS into new WEAPONS, PENDANTS, and USEFUL ITEMS!
    PENDANTS have a variety of effects, such as increasing your stats, making certain damage types stronger, and much more!

    Play it safe, or play it risky! Specialize in any damage type! The way you build your characters is up to you!
    No leveling! You get stronger through FORGING new EQUIPMENT and it's up to you what you focus on!

  • Watch out for your enemies weaknesses! There are four damage types, SLASHING, WHACKING, FLAMING, and LIGHTNING!
    Each one is strong against different foes, and each has a chance to apply a unique status effect whenever it is used!

  • Collect SPELL SCROLLS to unlock new SPELLS! Throughout the game you will encounter SCROLLS which will grant
    new spells to Verity and her crew! These can also be read for extra lore, and some tips and mechanics information.
    Ned Adams hopes you enjoy his dissertations, even if they are pretty old!

  • Simple puzzles stand in your way, push-able rocks as well, and you never know when you might need to run for your life!
    The game is fairly linear but be sure to explore a little, you never know what you might find!

content_descriptors.notes:
The word kill, and the concept of killing is semi-frequent, including used by protagonists.
Only monsters are actually killed... so far...

"Bleed" is a status effect that can be inflicted, and the concept of making enemies bleed to deal extra damage is an aspect of gameplay.
There is no realistic blood, nor does blood display on any characters at this time.

Damn and h-e-doublehockeysticks are used infrequently, including with hostility.

The game may get pretty emotionally heavy, with some difficult moral dilemmas, if I pull this off right!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: For clarity, don't demolish your keyboard.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Don't demolish your headphones or monitor either!

short_description: One hundred years ago, a mysterious calamity stripped thousands of their identities, left as blank slates (The Glitchless). GUIDE Verity, the one CHOSEN to put things right, on an RPG adventure full of fun, friends, and difficult questions. What is right? What is the truth?
